statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 0 \\ -2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -16 \\ -5 \\ 9 \\ 29 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \\ -1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -18 \\ -7 \\ 17 \\ 34 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
